Flower NPC.ISMA_FLOWER: Ze'mer? Is that really you? Thank you...
Flower NPC.KING_FLOWER: This power... It will taint you...
Flower NPC.MATO_FLOWER: Oh? Is that flower a present for me? I feel honored by that. Thank you. <page>I'm sure Sheo would really appreciate its beauty more than I ever could.
Flower NPC.MIDWIFE_FLOWER: You brought a snack? How generous of you. Allow me to taste it.
Flower NPC.SHEO_FLOWER: That flower you carry... It has an eerie beauty to it. Thank you for bringing it here. <page>I'm sure it will inspire me.
